page.title: 17Day in the life of
page.content: I get up at 8.00, get dressed & have my breakfast. I go upstairs, tidy my bedroom, brush my teeth & wash. I go downstairs & put my lunch in my bag. I go to school at 9.00. My class is class 1. First we go to assembly. Mr. Giles, our headmaste usually reads a story about Jesus. On Fridays a class usually does assembly. After that we do maths or spellings until breaktime. I have a packet of crisps. Then we do our project until dinner time. For dinner I have sandwiches. Dinner starts at l2.15 until l.30 and within that time we have 2 sittings. The 1st. is dinner but sandwiches for the infants, the 2nd. is for the older sandwiches. After dinner we sometimes have a mental test. After that we do corr- ections, or handwriting. After play we have a story until 3.30. (St.Johns)
